text: Maganey Kel (English: Listen, my son) is a 1965 Indian Tamil language film directed by Mukta V. Srinivasan. The film featured S. S. Rajendran, C. L. Anandan, and Pushpalatha in the lead roles. ==Soundtrack== Music was composed by the duo Viswanathan-Ramamoorthy while the lyrics were penned by Pattukkottai Kalyanasundaram. Playback singers are T. M. Soundararajan, Seerkazhi Govindarajan, A. M. Rajah, A. L. Raghavan, M. L. Vasanthakumari, P. Susheela, Jikki, T. V. Rathinam & K. Jamuna Rani. The song Unnai Paartha Kangal rendum was a hit on radio stations but the song was not included in the film. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! S/N !! Song !! Singer/s !! Lyrics !!
